name: MXCellularConditionMetric
desc: An object representing metrics about the condition of the cellular network.

items.name: var histogrammedCellularConditionTime: MXHistogram<MXUnitSignalBars>
items.desc: An object representing the distribution of the different levels of connectivity to the cellular network.

items.name: class MXUnitSignalBars
items.desc: A unit of measure for the number of bars of cellular network connectivity.
